Issue.creator: davidkel
Issue.summary: chaincode node documentation is published from master
Issue.description: http://fabric-shim.github.io documentation is taken directly from master. This means you cannot get the docs for a previous version and also the docs will include inreleased capability. A minimal solution should be to publish from the latest release branch which when cut would only mean it showing new stuff for a little while that wasn't available in an official release. It should also ensure it displays version information so people can understand the level of code this documentation refers to
